en: I'd rather run my own business.
ko: 내 사업 하는 게 좋은 거 같아

en: I'd rather have my own company.
ko: 내 사업 하는 게 좋은 거 같아
내 사업 시작하는 게 좋은 거 같아

en: I've been working at an IT company for the last seven years.
I've been working at a major corporation for the past seven years.
I've been working at a small enterprise for the last seven years.
